name: Wǒ de Rén Shēng
summary: This is a life simulator filled with laughter, banter, and all kinds of quirks, blending deck-building roguelike mechanics with the style of Luck Be a Landlord. With over 100 unique events and a card pool of 250+, it’s time to build a life that’s truly your own!

name: Wǒ de Tǎnkè Wǒ de Tuán
summary: Dive into My Tanks, My Legion - Large-Scale Team Battle Strategy Game, the ultimate mobile experience for tank warfare enthusiasts! Command powerful armored vehicles, forge unbreakable alliances, and conquer the world in this thrilling strategy game. Prepare for intense tank battles, strategic deployments, and large-scale team operations. Whether you are a seasoned strategist or a newcomer to the genre, get ready to immerse yourself in a world of explosive action and tactical brilliance. This MMO strategy game allows you to build your tank legion and lead your team to victory on the battlefield.
publishers: Bǎiyú Tǎnkè Zhùlì Nǐ de Zhēngxióng Zhī Lù!
